prompt_base: athletic young man, lean build, long straight black hair, cool intelligent eyes, wearing a dark ranger outfit with green armband, casual jeans, neutral expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k uhd, dslr, dramatic cinematic lighting, high quality, film grain, hyperdetailed skin texture, individual hair strands visible, textured denim fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, 3d render, plastic texture, helmet, black shiny hair, exaggerated eyes, deformed anatomy, flat lighting, low quality, smooth fabric
